summary: Provides tools to construct, convert, and read MODFLOW‑6 well (WEL) package inputs in the list format, supporting time‑varying well specifications and translating dataset structures into the required array representation.
business_intent: Enable groundwater modelers to generate and ingest well package data for MODFLOW‑6 simulations using the list input style, simplifying preparation of time‑dependent well information for model runs.
